name: vdclouis
body:
### Pseudo code project.
When programming with fellow devs we occasionally write some real life pseudo code. It's a way to express our frustrations or opinions. I thought it would be cool to dedicate a blog to this. Here is an example.

```
if ( school.name == 'AHS' ) { NUKE.permission = TRUE };

```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
